mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into customer (cus_name, cus_shortened, cus_property, cus_level, cus_linkman, cus_new_old, cus_business, cus_source, cus_province, cus_city, cus_region, cus_address, cus_remark, cus_business_license) values (#{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusShortened,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusNewOld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusRegion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update customer set cus_name = #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_shortened = #{cusShortened,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_property = #{cusProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_level = #{cusLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus_linkman = #{cusLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_new_old = #{cusNewOld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_business = #{cusBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_source = #{cusSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus_province = #{cusProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus_city = #{cusCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus_region = #{cusRegion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus_address = #{cusAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_remark = #{cusRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_business_license = #{cusBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cus_name, cus_shortened, cus_property, cus_level, cus_linkman, cus_new_old, cus_business, cus_source, cus_province, cus_city, cus_region, cus_address, cus_remark, cus_business_license from customer where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, cus_name, cus_shortened, cus_property, cus_level, cus_linkman, cus_new_old, cus_business, cus_source, cus_province, cus_city, cus_region, cus_address, cus_remark, cus_business_license from customer
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into customer (cus_name, cus_shortened, cus_property, cus_level, cus_linkman, cus_new_old, cus_business, cus_source, cus_province, cus_city, cus_region, cus_address, cus_remark, cus_business_license) values (#{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusShortened,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusNewOld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusRegion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
